description:
It's inevitable, climbing ropes get dirty. But those little grains of sand and grit slowly wear away at the sheath fibres, causing your rope to get fuzzy and wear out faster. Extend the lifetime of your rope by giving it a Wicked Good wash, because a cleaner rope is a safer rope.

  • Each packet contains enough for 1 rope
  • Biodegradable solution
name: Sterling Rope Wicked Good Rope Wash
